servinfo.title: Engine Basic Inspection
servinfo.ptxt: This check is very important for troubleshooting when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection:M16A and J20A .

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:M16A and J20A .

testgroup.question: Is vehicle equipped with keyless start control system?

testgroup.title: Check keyless start control system malfunction (if equipped keyless start control system)

test1.ptxt: Check keyless start control system referring to Keyless Start System Operation Inspection .

testgroup.question: Is check result satisfactory?

action.ptxt: Go to Cranking System Symptom Diagnosis:M16A and J20A .

testgroup.title: Check idle speed

test1.ptxt: Warm up engine to normal operating temperature.
Shift transmission to neutral position for M/T model (“P” position for A/T).
Make sure that all electrical loads are switched off.
Check engine idle speed with scan tool.

testgroup.question: Is it 600 – 700 (for J20A engine), 610 – 710 (for M16A engine) r/min.?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine Symptom Diagnosis:M16A and J20A .

testgroup.title: Check ignition timing

test1.ptxt: Using SUZUKI scan tool, select “Active test” mode on SUZUKI scan tool and fix ignition timing to initial one.
Using timing light (1), check initial ignition timing.

testgroup.question: Is it 5° – 15° (for J20A engine), 7° – 17° (for M16A engine) BTDC at specified idle speed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine Symptom Diagnosis:M16A and J20A .
Check ignition control related parts referring to Ignition Timing Inspection:M16A and J20A .

testgroup.title: Check immobilizer system malfunction (if equipped immobilizer control system)

test1.ptxt: Check immobilizer control system referring to Immobilizer Control System Check:Petrol Engine Model .

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

testgroup.title: Check fuel supply

test1.ptxt: Check to make sure that enough fuel is filled in fuel tank.
Turn ON ignition switch for 2 seconds and then OFF.

testgroup.question: Is fuel pressure felt from fuel feed hose when ignition switch is turned ON?

testgroup.title: Check fuel pump for operation
testgroup.question: Was fuel pump operating sound heard from fuel filler for about 2 seconds after ignition switch ON and stop?

action.ptxt: Go to Fuel Pressure Check:M16A and J20A .
Go to Fuel Pump and Its Circuit Check:M16A and J20A .

test1.ptxt: Remove spark plugs and connect them to high-tension cords or ignition coil assemblies.
Crank engine and check if each spark plug sparks.

action.ptxt: Go to Ignition Spark Test:M16A and J20A .

testgroup.title: Check fuel injector for operation

test1.ptxt: Install spark plugs and connect injector connectors.
Using sound scope (1), check operating sound of each injector (2) when cranking engine.

testgroup.question: Was injector operating sound heard from all injectors?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine Symptom Diagnosis:M16A and J20A .
Go to Fuel Injector Circuit Check:M16A and J20A .
